options.text: Default value of text input option

panels.description: Per second average rate of response time over 1 minute

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{ exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[1m])

panels.title: Response Time

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: Total CPU Usage

targets.legendFormat: Processes virtual memory size in bytes {{job}}

targets.expr: ((sum(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode=~"user|nice|system|irq|softirq|steal|idle|iowait"}) by (instance, job)) - (sum(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode=~"idle|iowait"}) by (instance, job))) / (sum(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode=~"user|nice|system|irq|softirq|steal|idle|iowait"}) by (instance, job)) * 100

panels.title: No. of actions on docker daemon
